title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to John H. McCue, July 14, 1859
summary: Jedediah Hotchkiss informs John H. McCue that Hotchkiss has used McCue as a reference. Hotchkiss includes a flyer about the "Loch Willow School" in Augusta County, of which he is Principal. He asks McCue to refer anyone whose sons need an education to his school.
keywords: Economy, Education, Family, Home Front, Women, American Civil War
